medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 5-6 days prior to admission, with worsening pain leading to pleuritic symptoms today and causing shallow breaths. The patient also experienced anorexia and nausea but denied vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HLD, HTN, Back pain, Chronic cervical neck pain, GERD, Depression, Chronic opioid use, Lumbar discectomy and fusion
